message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  It's a great deal for a product worth so much to you.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $11,000 for it. Let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $12,000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
Alice, I understand your position, but I believe $11,000 is still a reasonable price given the value of the product to me. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle at $11,500?
